title: League of Legends Oceanic Discord

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Hi summoners, we’re looking for even more members to join our huge 5,500+ member Discord for Oceanic players. We hold events and have special features for everybody to enjoy such as:

Weekly RP giveaways. 
Weekly events. 
Friendly in-house custom games hosted as a Party Night. 
Monthly/bi-monthly tournaments with Riot Prizing (RP, triumphant Ryze, etc.)
Dedicated platform for Oceanic based streamers. 
Champion and ranked based roles on the Discord. 
Engaging and interactive community. 

Join anytime: http://discord.gg/HsfgbMX

replies.body: Good server, free stuff + active community :)
Amazing server, amazing staff! Would 100% recommend you to this awesome community :D
Great server, giveaways are constant and they have many cool features.
I've been here about 6 months, enjoyed every moment. friendly staff and free giveaways
